review.comment: As a new e-commerce business owner I engaged Wowza to help me with my social media advertising, however, they did a lot more for my business than writing ads. They set up marketing flows, made enhancements to my website, added and fixed so many things I thought I had set up correctly but hadn't. I learnt a lot from them in our 6-week engagement and I recommend their services. Karen at DEAR HEART.
review.review_reply: Thank you Karen! :) We enjoyed the work with you and excited about the Dear Heart's brand future and its growth!!

review.comment: Vanessa is a lovely person who has an in depth knowledge on digital marketing. Would highly recommend.
review.review_reply: Thank you Tyler for the review :) Much appreciated.  Wishing you all the success with your digital marketing journey!

review.comment: Vanessa is my heroine! Her expertise and depth of knowledge is outstanding, something I can leverage with my business.  Vanessa and her team go above and beyond to complete my projects.   From being highly responsive to providing great solutions and also delivering to tight deadlines.  Her project management and communication during the process is always top notch.  Her strategies have also increased leads with fantastic success!   I  highly recommend you partner with Wowza Digital Marketing, it will be the best decision you make.
review.review_reply: Thank you Susan :) we have enjoyed working with the Susan Bucknor brand and wish you every success with the campaign at hand! :)
